google_translated: Lourta = Kusan Kuna's "Book" is stored in the library

en_text: These are stories with no end.
jp_text: この物語に終章はない
google_translated: There is no end in this story

en_text: People will continue to laugh, cry, struggle, love, gain, and lose,
jp_text: 人はこの先も笑い　泣き　争い　愛し
google_translated: People laugh at this earlier and love

en_text: each adding to the unique tale embedded in their soul.
jp_text: それぞれの物語を魂の中に刻んでいく
google_translated: Chopes each story in the soul

en_text: They live on, within this very world.
jp_text: この世界で　生きていく
google_translated: Live in this world
